basics.name: Vanessa Dickerson
basics.label: Software Engineering Student
basics.summary: Howdy! I'm Vanessa Dickerson, a junior majoring in computer science and minoring in statistics at Texas A&M University. I currently work in software engineering at a civil engineering firm. I'm passionate about serving and advocating for my community, developing new and innovative solutions to unsolved problems, and optimizing my life.

work.name: Torres & Associates
work.summary: Created and deployed full-stack progressive web applications using cutting-edge technologies, and built, architected, and deployed numerous cloud systems currently in production in my community.
highlights: Developed a Flood Early Warning System application from the ground up for the City of Bryan, currently in deployment on AWS Amplify
Designed a scalable, well-tested, and stateless alert system that near instantly messages the appropriate users over AWS SNS based on dynamic gauge thresholds and alert statuses
Created SQL schemas, backend API architecture, and React-based frontends for data retrieval, visualisation, and client interaction
Integrated cloud-based architecture, utilizing AWS S3 buckets for image retrieval and upload, Auth0 authentication linking to database permissions, and integrations with external vendors

volunteer.summary: Led advocacy and information delivery for transgender students at TAMU.
highlights: Collaborated with faculty and clubs to deliver transition resources
Engaged in activism to combat anti-trans decisions alongside the Queer Empowerment Council

projects.name: Is-It-Phishy
projects.description: A neural network-powered URL phishing detector integrated with an interactive frontend game.
highlights: Built a phishing URL detector with 95% accuracy using a neural network
Developed Flask API to bridge model and frontend
Created React/NextJS webapp for interactive play

projects.name: NeoNeoPets (Aggie Coding Club)
projects.description: A .NET cloud-based webapp built to simulate a nostalgic online pet experience with modern tech.
highlights: Led team as Head Project Manager
Architected project from scratch and oversaw development
Used Git, Azure, and .NET for robust cloud-hosted experience
